Change Log
===========

0.0.2 (1/4/2021)
-----------------
-Added feature to create a textfile
-Added a feature to check duplicate values

0.0.3 (2/4/2021)
-----------------
-Modified the csv_module to handle duplicates of Image format questions.

0.0.4 (3/4/2021)
-----------------
-Modified putInCsv function such that it will append the new entries in the variation file

0.0.5 (5/1/2021)
-----------------
-Introduced utf-8 encoding to the module.

0.0.6 (24/6/2021)
-----------------
-discarded

0.0.7 (24/6/2021)
-----------------
-discarded

0.0.8 (24/6/2021)
-----------------
-Introduced drive API as drive_api
-added new CSV attribute to putInCsv 

0.0.9 (25/6/2021)
-----------------
-discarded

0.1.0 (26/6/2021)
-----------------
-removed colab bug

0.1.1 (29/6/2021)
-----------------
-discarded

0.1.2 (29/6/2021)
-----------------
-Create Xlsx file feature added
-Number of iterations will give N provided values irrespective of the Status of Remove duplicates
